thread.section_title: the Quin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A Brief Stay
thread.title_full: A Brief Stay - Review of the Quin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Colin H
title: A Brief Stay
text: The Quinn Hotel is an elegant, modern island of comfort and calm in the middle of the mass tidal movement around Central Park and the 5th-6th Avenues. The ground floor restaurant and bar area was lively and served a nice meal. Staff are highly responsive, very polite and efficient. The room was very modern, well equipped and well suite to our needs, both in terms of comfort and being able to conduct our business activity.
